meaningMnemonic: Sitting on the <radical>lid</radical> of a toilet, you're praying your <radical>poop</radical> <radical>explosion</radical> will be flushed away, beseeching the <radical>cross</radical> decorating the bathroom wall. The poop needs to be one hundred <kanji>percent</kanji> flushed away because you're on a date, and you don't want even one percent of your explosion left for them to see.
readingMnemonic: It was extra important that there was zero <kanji>percent</kanji> poop left, because you're not on a date just anywhere, you're at the <reading>Ritz</reading> (りつ)!
